name: Litigation Funding 2017
content: The Litigation Funding Conference is an intense networking and deal-making event for financial and legal professionals. The next conference will be on April 28, 2017 in New York at LMHQ. The conference is attended by attorneys, litigation finance executives, litigation support experts, brokers, hedge funds, private equity firms, government and consultants. Those involved with corporate cases & high value commercial claims will benefit the most from this event. The conference is also for those involved with: arbitration funding, dispute resolution funding solutions, international arbitration, legal advances, third party litigation funding, lawsuit litigation funding and pre-settlement financing.
